<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={{"content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"object","properties":{"certificate_customer_name":{"type":"string","description":"Name of the customer on the exemption certificate"},"signed_date":{"type":"string","format":"date","description":"The date the certificate was signed"},"description":{"type":"string","description":"A brief description of the exemption certificate"},"business_type":{"type":"string","description":"Type of business (e.g., Retail, Wholesale)"},"tax_type":{"type":"string","description":"Type of tax the certificate applies to (e.g., Sales Tax)"},"tax_type_id":{"type":"integer","description":"ID associated with the tax type"},"comment":{"type":"string","description":"Any additional comments about the certificate"},"expiration_date":{"type":"string","format":"date","description":"The date when the certificate expires"},"document_exists":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if the document exists"},"is_valid":{"type":"boolean","description":"Status indicating if the certificate is valid"},"verified":{"type":"boolean","description":"Indicates if the certificate has been verified"},"certificate_labels":{"type":"string","description":"Labels associated with the certificate (comma-separated)"},"purchase_order_number":{"type":"string","description":"Purchase order number associated with the certificate"},"exemption_limit":{"type":"number","description":"The limit of the exemption in monetary value"},"exempt_percentage":{"type":"number","format":"float","description":"Percentage of the exemption"},"ecm_status":{"type":"string","description":"Status of the exemption certificate management (ECM)"},"created_by_id":{"type":"integer","description":"ID of the user who created the certificate"},"updated_by_id":{"type":"integer","description":"ID of the user who last updated the certificate"},"file":{"type":"object","description":"Information about the certificate file","properties":{"path":{"type":"string","description":"Path to the certificate file"}},"required":["path"]},"tax_exemption":{"type":"object","description":"Tax exemption information associated with the certificate","properties":{"customer_id":{"type":"string","description":"ID of the customer associated with the tax exemption"},"effective_date":{"type":"string","format":"date","description":"The date the exemption becomes effective"},"exemption_reason":{"type":"string","description":"Reason for the exemption"}},"required":["customer_id","effective_date","exemption_reason"]},"external_address":{"type":"object","description":"External address related to the exemption","properties":{"state":{"type":"string","description":"The state associated with the address"}},"required":["state"]}},"required":["certificate_customer_name","signed_date","description","business_type","tax_type","tax_type_id","expiration_date","document_exists","is_valid","verified","certificate_labels","purchase_order_number","exemption_limit","exempt_percentage","ecm_status","created_by_id","updated_by_id"],"title":"Exemption_Certificate"}}},"required":true}}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
